data.title: Oracle's Opera Cloud
data.role: Framework developer, Full stack application engineer, Intern team lead.
data.description: A comprehensive cloud-based property management system (PMS) designed specifically for the hospitality industry, allowing them to manage reservations, guest profiles, room inventory, sales, and other operations centrally within a single platform; some notable clients include Hyatt, Crown Resorts, Minor Hotel Group, Premier Inn Hotels Limited, and various other large hotel chains across the globe.

data.title: Order Management System
data.description: Created an order and stock management web application for a construction company, featuring four distinct user roles with tailored pages to support their specific functionalities. The system provides a comprehensive set of features for efficient order tracking, inventory management, and reporting. Delivered a high-performance, full-stack website.

data.title: Safe Video Kit - Secure and Seamless Video Editing and Sharing
data.description: Safe Video Kit is a cutting-edge web application designed to provide secure and seamless video editing and sharing capabilities. With a strong focus on data security, Safe Video Kit ensures that your videos are protected while offering a seamless editing experience. Unlock new possibilities and unleash your creativity without compromising on the privacy of your valuable video content.

data.title: Student Profile Management System
data.description: The Student Profile Management System is a web application that simplifies student information management for educational institutions. It provides secure login, student registration, course management, attendance tracking, grade management, communication, and data export/import features.
